version_description:
Proud to be a Vietnamese ride-hailing smartphone app, be aims to be the CONNECTOR between riders and drivers to efficiently meet daily transportation needs, while offer an outstanding service quality.
be provide many types of services:
-beBike: Convenient bike service, easy to go everywhere.
-beCar: Comfortable car service, feel like your personal driver.
WHY SHOULD USE be?
1. Ride-hailing 4.0 technology on mobile.
2. Commitment to high quality service.
3. Quick pick-up/ drop-off.
4. Safety for riders.
5. Competitive price.
6. Reliable drivers.
7. Riders and drivers growth, positive feedbacks.
HOW TO USE be:
1. Install the be app, it's free.
2. Pick your service - bike or car, start to book a ride.
3. Choose the pick-up location and destination, be confirm to you the nearest driver.
4. Quick update ride information and easy itinerary tracking.
5. Convenient & safety payment by cash, credit cards or e-wallets.
If you have questions, please contact us via hotro@be.xyz or visit www.be.xyz for more information.

Proud to be a Vietnamese ride-hailing smartphone app, be aims to be the CONNECTOR between riders and drivers to efficiently meet daily transportation needs, while offer an outstanding service quality.
be provide many types of services:
-beBike: Convenient bike service, easy to go everywhere.
-beCar: Comfortable car service, feel like your personal driver.
WHY SHOULD USE be?
1. Ride-hailing 4.0 technology on mobile.
2. Commitment to high quality service.
3. Quick pick-up/ drop-off.
4. Safety for riders.
5. Competitive price.
6. Reliable drivers.
7. Riders and drivers growth, positive feedbacks.
HOW TO USE be:
1. Install the be app, it's free.
2. Pick your service - bike or car, start to book a ride.
3. Choose the pick-up location and destination, be confirm to you the nearest driver.
4. Quick update ride information and easy itinerary tracking.
5. Convenient & safety payment by cash, credit cards or e-wallets.
If you have questions, please contact us via hotro@be.xyz or visit www.be.xyz for more information.

This updated version contains changes for better app performance including:
- Improve waiting time display
- Group customer’s ride history by date
- Improve map’s locating feature

Chúc mừng sinh nhật be tròn 1 tuổi!

be luôn nỗ lực để đem đến cho bạn trải nghiệm tốt hơn.
TÍNH NĂNG MỚI:
- Đặt xe đi tỉnh (chỉ có ở một số thành phố nhất định)
- beLoyalty: tính năng tích điểm và đổi quà
- Giao hàng: theo dõi thông tin đơn hàng

CẢI TIẾN & SỬA LỖI:
- Giao diện hoàn toàn mới tối ưu trải nghiệm khách hàng
- Sửa lỗi và cải thiện hiệu năng
Cám ơn bạn đã sử dụng be!

Happy birthday be!
be always strive to bring you a better experience.

NEW FEATURES:
- Ride: long trip (in some cities)
- beLoyalty: earn points and redeem
- Delivery: track and trace delivery status

IMPROVEMENTS & BUGS FIXED:
- A whole new user interface
- Fixed bugs and improved performance
Thank you for using be!

be always strive to bring you a better experience.
NEW FEATURES:
- New language: English (Menu > My profile > Change language)
- Ride: Share trip information to other people
- Delivery: multiple drop-off locations (upto 10 locations)
- Delivery: COD (cash on delivery)
- Delivery: paid by recipient (for 1 drop-off location)
- Delivery: choose the best promotion automatically
- Delivery: supports company payment method
- Delivery: add e-invoice feature

IMPROVEMENTS & BUGS FIXED:
- Fixed a lot of bugs and improve performance
Thank you for using be!

be always strive to bring you a better experience.
This update fixes some bugs and improves performance
Thank you for using be!

Thank you for using be!

This updated version contains changes for better app performance including:
- Improve loading animation.
- Improve the interface when there are more than 3 types of services.
- Display details for promotions when customers tap on the notification.
- Other minor bug fixes.

This updated version contains changes for better app performance including:
- Create a shipping order, track shipment status and manage your packages wherever you are with our newest service: beDelivery. Choose beDelivery to get hassle-free service, free returning at best fares and reliable quality.

This updated version contains changes for better app performance including:
- Update new UI for promotion screen.
- Update Google Maps style.
- Display Corp Account Balance.
- Increase number of characters when entering the billing address.
- Other minor bug fixes.

This updated version contains changes for better app performance including:
- Auto selects the highest promotion/coupon for the user.
- Fix some bugs.

be luôn nỗ lực để đem đến cho bạn trải nghiệm tốt hơn. Phiên bản cập nhật này bao gồm:
- Hiển thị thông tin xe của tài xế khi khách hàng đặt chuyến.
- Hiển thị số sao của khách hàng.
- Hỗ trợ khách hàng cập nhật email hay yêu cầu gửi lại email xác nhận trong Hồ sơ cá nhân.
- Cải thiện một số lỗi nhỏ khác.

  This updated version contains changes for better app performance including:
- Show vehicle information when customers book trips.
- Show customer rating.
- Support customers to update email or request to resend email confirmation.
- Fix some small bugs.
